pkgmetadata.longdescription: sitemap=======Sitemap library for dynamically generating ``sitemap.xml``.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/sitemap.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/sitemapInstallation------------.. code:: bash pip install sitemapUsage-----Urlset^^^^^^.. code:: python from sitemap import Url, Urlset urlset = Urlset() url = Url('https://www.example.com/', changefreq='weekly') urlset.add_url(url) # urlset.to_string() urlset.write_xml('sitemap.xml')Siteindex^^^^^^^^^.. code:: python from sitemap import Sitemap, Siteindex siteindex = Siteindex() sitemap = Sitemap('https://www.example.com/sitemap.xml') siteindex.add_sitemap(sitemap) # siteindex.to_string() siteindex.write_xml('sitemap.xml')
